text: Motion
Motion
Motion

Sakuya,
seems like you're doing well with the updates.

Oh, Twesta?
Yeah, I've been posting regularly since then.

The response seems positive, doesn't it?
And it looks like you're getting a lot of replies too.

It's good that Sakuya's concern for
everyone is coming across clearly.

Haha… Even though those words were intended
for the fans, it seems like they reached you too.

Oh, sorry…
I just couldn't help but wonder how people are reacting.

It's appreciated. Knowing that there are people who
care about me even in my immediate surroundings.

Oh…
Haha.

Hey, look, Producer-san.
There's someone who always replies to me.

It seems like they're eagerly awaiting my updates,
and through this, they're reaching out to me.

That's…
really heartwarming.

Haha, yeah. Despite how precious their time must
be, they're still taking the time for me like this.

That's probably true for Sakuya too, right?
Using her time after lessons…

Haha, it's a mutual thing, then.
Both for me and for this person.

And also, everyone who looks at Twesta…
Even though they're far away, we're connected.

Yeah.
Sakuya's words have created a connection.

If that's the case…
there's nothing more joyous than this.

Thanks to your suggestion, Producer-san.
…Thank you.
